name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Full-Stack Web Developer with 10+ years of experience focused on delivering high-performance software solutions in healthcare and finance. Proficient in **Python**, **Node.js**, **React.js**, **Vue.js**, and **Next.js** for robust application development. Expertise in API development and microservices architecture, ensuring seamless system integration for optimal performance. Experienced in deploying applications on **AWS** with a solid understanding of both SQL and NoSQL databases. A strong advocate for UX patterns that enhance user experience, complemented by excellent problem-solving and communication skills. Brings a wealth of experience in developing cloud-native applications and implementing CI/CD automation, paired with a commitment to building secure, maintainable solutions in compliance with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Passionate about leveraging technology to create systems that deliver significant real-world impact.

experience.responsibilities:
• Designed and implemented full-stack solutions leveraging **Python**, **Node.js**, and **React.js** to deliver high-quality user experiences while ensuring effective **API development** and adherence to best practices in **microservices** architecture.
• Developed and integrated user-friendly interfaces with modern frameworks such as **Vue.js**, **Next.js**, enhancing performance through thoughtful **UX patterns** for diverse applications.
• Collaborated on **system integration** initiatives that improved workflow efficiency, implementing scalable solutions for multi-platform deployment, and ensuring seamless interactions within back-end and front-end services.
• Optimized performance and reliability of applications hosted on **AWS** by utilizing cloud technologies to manage and analyze both **SQL** and **NoSQL** databases.
• Employed effective **problem-solving** strategies to resolve complex challenges during development, maintaining clear **communication** with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.
• Maintained high standards for code quality and reliability through automated testing frameworks and thorough code reviews, ensuring optimal performance across applications.
• Conducted in-depth analyses of user feedback and performance metrics to drive product enhancements and iterate on existing features, increasing customer satisfaction by **30%**.
• Engaged in continuous learning and adaptation of emerging technologies to keep the development stack updated and maintain a competitive edge in a rapidly evolving industry.

• Developed and integrated **API development** using **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django) to enhance interoperability and maintainability across financial platforms.
• Designed and implemented **microservices** architecture, improving scalability and throughput for high-volume transaction systems by **25%**.
• Created dynamic front-end applications utilizing **React.js** (18), **Vue.js** (3), and **Next.js**, applying **TypeScript**, **Redux Toolkit**, and **Tailwind CSS** to enhance user experience and responsiveness for financial dashboards.
• Conducted data analysis and built real-time transaction monitoring dashboards using **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, enabling operations teams to reduce response times to incidents by **30%**.
• Integrated messaging queues like **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** to support robust event-driven architectures with a latency improvement of **15%** for processing transactions and alerts.
• Built and orchestrated ETL pipelines leveraging **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, achieving real-time ingestion efficiency from diverse data sources, facilitating quicker data accessibility.
• Developed AI/ML-driven fraud detection systems using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, which increased fraud detection efficiency by **40%** through analysis of transaction patterns.
• Established ML pipelines for critical processes such as credit scoring and churn prediction via **MLflow** and **Airflow**, enabling real-time decision-making directly within backend services.

• Developed and optimized RESTful APIs using **Python** (FastAPI, Django) and **Node.js** (NestJS, Express) for seamless integration within a microservices architecture, achieving **99.9%** uptime and responsive performance.
• Engineered innovative solutions to enhance system integration, utilizing **WebSockets** and **Kafka** for real-time data communication, which improved order processing speeds by **30%**.
• Designed responsive user interfaces across various platforms using **React.js** (v18) and **Vue.js** (v3), implementing UX patterns that increased user engagement by **25%**.
• Ensured efficient data management by leveraging both **SQL** (PostgreSQL) and **NoSQL** (MongoDB, Redis, Cassandra) solutions, which facilitated rapid data access in high-traffic environments with a **50%** reduction in query response times.
• Integrated advanced AI/ML algorithms for personalized user experiences, utilizing **scikit-learn** and **TensorFlow**, ultimately boosting conversion rates by **15%** through improved recommendation accuracy.
• Applied robust caching strategies with **Redis** to optimize application performance, resulting in a **40%** improvement in load times for frequently accessed data.
• Facilitated controlled deployments and feature management using **LaunchDarkly** and Kubernetes, enhancing release efficiency and risk management for major updates by **20%**.
• Developed mobile-first, SEO-friendly e-commerce platforms using **Next.js** and HTML5/CSS3, achieving compliance with accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1) and improving visibility in search rankings.
• Implemented secure payment solutions via **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, ensuring PCI compliance and safeguarding sensitive customer information throughout transactions.
• Established a strong emphasis on security by incorporating role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0**, ensuring GDPR compliance and robust user data protection throughout the application.
